author: Brandon Farrell
comment: Amazing watch face.  Loving it on my Huawei Watch.  Any possibility of it supporting the Gear S3?

author: Amy Farrey
comment: I love this watchface design, but unfortunately I use a 12 hour time format and this doesn't have it.

author: Peter Yates
comment: Great, tidy, minimalistic but colourful. I've had this watch face enabled since I bought it

reply.author: STETTINER
reply.content: Hey SiuChiu. Thanks for a positive feedback and 4 stars. Will try to implement 12h mode, when updating the app :)

author: David Dodge
comment: I like the look of it, and the option to choose either white or black face. I'd like to be able to use 12 hour format, though, rather than 24. Not being in the military or working for the government, I have little use for 24 hour format digital clocks.

reply.author: STETTINER
reply.content: Hey David. Thanks for a positive feedback and 4 stars. Will try to implement 12h mode, when updating the app :)

title: Looks Cool

author: Rick Mendoza
comment: This would be my perfect watch face if i could get A.M. P.M. for the digital watch face and not always on 24hr format! make it happen please!

reply.author: STETTINER
reply.content: Hey Rick. Thanks for the feedback. Will try to implement 12h mode, when updating the app.

author: James Barkman
comment: Great looking watch face! It looks fantastic on my Moto 360 Zenwatch 2. However, there is no option for a 12 hour mode in digital, which makes this watch face useless for me. Nice try, but not quite there.

reply.author: STETTINER
reply.content: Hey James. Thanks for the feedback. Will try to implement 12h mode, when updating the app.

title: Needs 12 hour mode

author: Peter Shannon
comment: Very cheerful, only date isn't localised.
title: Really nice face

reply.author: STETTINER
reply.content: Thank you for the positive feedback and 5 star rating :)!

reply.author: STETTINER
reply.content: Hey Matthew. Thanks for a positive feedback and 5 stars rating :)!

reply.author: STETTINER
reply.content: Hey Asep. Probably, there is some synchro issue (between your phone and watch). Please make sure that battery levels are over 60% and try to force the synchronization in Android wear app. Should help :)

author: Colin Simone
comment: Love the colors of this face! Definitely a head turner here.
title: Bold, bright and eye catching

author: Mohd Azwan Ahmad
comment: How do I change from analog to digital? Because I can't get to the settings screen.

reply.author: STETTINER
reply.content:
Just tap and hold watch's screen (if you have latest Android Wear installed on your device).
Afterwards (when on screen, that allows you to switch between watch faces) please tap the small icon in the bottom to enter settings :)

title: Watch face settings

comment: Nice uniquely designed very colorful watch faces. Nice work!
title: Brilliantly colored

comment: Digital does not look good square watch.
